titles.title: My Life Is In You, Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My life is in You, Lord.
My strength is in You, Lord.
My hope is in You, Lord,
In You. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will praise You with all my life.
I will praise You with all my strength.
All of my life, all of my strength,
All of my hope is in You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mi vida esta en Ti, Dios,
mi fuerza esta en Ti, Dios,
Mi esperanza en Ti, Dios,
en Ti (Repetir).

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Te alabo con toda mi vida,
Te alabo con mis fuerzas,
Toda mi vida,
Todas mis fuerzas.
Mi esperanza esta en Ti.
